Title: Cape May
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Daniel Knauf, Brandon Margolis (executive story editor), Brandon Sonnier (executive story editor), Brian Studler (executive story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: A mysterious beauty on the run from unknown assailants accidentally crosses paths with Reddington and enlists his help to fight back against her attackers.
